item.title: CVE-2022-38468|2024-08-03T10:54:03.798Z -- imagely -- wordpress%20gallery%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20nextgen%20gallery
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Imagely WordPress Gallery Plugin – NextGEN Gallery plugin <= 3.28 leading to thumbnail alteration.
